attributes.action: Make "Crispy Terradactyl" a new Walkers crisp flavour
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Walkers Crisps are running a competition to design a new flavour.  This is to mark the 60th birthday of this great British company.  In the spirit of fun and all that is great about our nation, I ask the Prime Minister to support "Crispy Terradactyl" as a new flavour.  (It's a bit like chicken).

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
